import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import './productDisplay.css'; import star_icon from "../Assets/star_icon.png"; import star_dull_icon from "../Assets/star_dull_icon.png"; import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const { Products} = props; const { addToCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

); }; export default ProductDisplay;
